prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia, Dean of the Curry School of Education, General Records, Accession #RG-10/1/1.771, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was an archival transfer from the Curry School of Education, University of Virginia on September 14, 1977.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of general records of the Office of the Dean of the Curry School of Education during the tenure of John L. Manahan, including correspondence and related papers concerning admissions, appointments, degree recipients, faculty, scholarships and testing.
